document.masterDocTitle: Biruta Rasiņa’s collection of scale insects (Hemiptera: Sternorrhyncha Coccomorpha) at the Latvian National Museum of Natural History, including type material of several species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Biruta Rasiņa’s collection of scale insects (Hemiptera: Sternorrhyncha Coccomorpha) at the Latvian National Museum of Natural History, including type material of several species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Names used in the samples:
Eulecanium corni , Lecanium corni , Parthenolecanium corni
